description: SpaceX successfully launched 28 Starlink satellites on December 4, 2025, from Vandenberg Space Force Base in California. The Falcon 9 lifted off at 12:42 pm PST and completed a smooth drone-ship landing just 8.5 minutes later, marking the booster’s fourth flight. This mission represents SpaceX’s 156th Falcon 9 launch of the year, continuing the rapid expansion of the Starlink network, which already includes thousands of satellites designed to deliver global, high-speed broadband connectivity.
title: SpaceX Launches 28 New Starlink Satellites as Falcon 9 Hits Another Milestone

description: Astronomers have identified a 50-million-light-year-long cosmic filament in which 14 gas-rich galaxies all rotate in sync with the structure itself. The filament, mapped about 140 million light-years away, appears young, cold and shaped by slow cosmic flows. Galaxies on opposite ends move in opposite directions, suggesting the entire filament is spinning.
title: Astronomers Spot Galaxies Moving in Sync Across a 50-Million-Light-Year Stretch

description: Researchers are using classical Indian dance, especially Bharatanatyam mudras, to improve robotic hand dexterity. By analysing 30 structured mudras, scientists found they offer more versatile motion patterns than everyday grasps. These dance-derived synergies could enhance prosthetics, assistive robots, gesture-based rehabilitation and future humanoid systems needing refined, expressive hand control.
title: Indian Dance Mudras May Revolutionise Robotic Hand Control, UMBC Study Shows

description: Astronomers studying the dwarf-star system TOI-3884b have uncovered a striking anomaly: the planet’s orbit is sharply misaligned with its star’s rotation. Using multicolour transit observations, researchers detected repeated starspot-crossing events that revealed the planet passes over cooler regions on the stellar surface. Follow-up monitoring showed the star rotates every 11 days, allowing scientists to reconstruct the system’s geometry.
title: Misaligned Exoplanet Is Challenging How We Think Solar Systems Form

description: The Atacama Cosmology Telescope’s final polarisation maps reinforce the long-standing Hubble tension, confirming a slower early-universe expansion rate similar to Planck’s findings. By ruling out several proposed fixes, the new data intensifies the mystery and suggests current cosmological models may be missing key physics.
title: New Telescope Data Deepens the Mystery of How Fast the Universe Is Expanding

description: Kalamkaval, the highly anticipated crime-drama thriller featuring Mammootty and Vinayakan in the lead roles, has been released in theatres. The battle taken up by the actor through this film is also shrouded in heavy publicity. A debut movie by director Jithin K. Jose, Sooran narrates a sudden police investigation that concerns an entire village and is likely to come off as shocking. Set in the sleepy town of Kottayikonam, it begins with a simple question that leads to some bone-chilling truths and a few unsolved criminal cases linked to an extensive mafia operating undercover.
title: Mammootty's Kalamkaval Reportedly Gets an OTT Partner: When, Where to Watch the Film Online?

description: Tom Cruise returns in Mission: Impossible – The Final Reckoning, the explosive finale of the iconic franchise. Now available on Prime Video, the film follows Ethan Hunt’s final and most dangerous mission to stop a rogue AI from triggering global disaster. Packed with action, suspense, and emotional depth, the movie delivers a powerful end to the legendary saga.
title: Mission: Impossible – The Final Reckoning Now Streaming Online: Watch Ethan Hunt's Final Quest on This OTT Platform

description: Dhoolpet Police Station, a crime thriller based on Chennai's Dhoolpet area and the local police station and the cases they deal with on a day-to-day basis, along with political conflicts, is covered in these 50 episodes, which is all set to stream on Aha Tamil, this December 5th.
title: Dhoolpet Police Station OTT Release Details: When, Where to Watch Tamil-Language Crime Thriller Online?

description: OpenAI and Jony Ive’s joint venture cannot use the “io” name for its hardware after a US appeals court upheld a temporary restraining order. The ruling supports AI startup iyO, which argued the branding created likely consumer confusion despite no product launch. The court said publicity alone counts as trademark use, forcing the venture to remove “io” branding from marketing tied to voice-driven AI devices.
title: OpenAI, Jony Ive Lose Appeal on ‘io’ Brand as Court Upholds Decision

description: India’s tablet market shipped 1.33 million units in Q3 2025, down 19.7 percent year-over-year, according to IDC.  The consumer segment rose 13.5 percent due to festive demand, but commercial shipments dropped 53.5 percent amid reduced education and SMB spending. Samsung led with a 37.5 percent share, followed by Lenovo and Xiaomi. IDC says tablets are increasingly used for productivity, and rising PC prices may further boost adoption.
title: Samsung Leads Market, Xiaomi Climbs to Third Position as India Tablet Shipments Decline 19.7 Percent in Q3 2025: IDC

description: The Boys is an American satirical superhero television series that showcases what happens when they turn to the dark side. With four seasons already out, the show has built a massive following, owing to its intense storyline, packed action sequences, and satirical take on the superhero debate. With The Boys Season 5 highly awaited, Amazon Prime Video has released a teaser for what is set to be its final season. Titled 'Scorched Earth', its OTT release date has been teased by the video streaming platform.
title: The Boys Season 5 OTT Release Timeline Teased: Titled 'Scorched Earth', Know When, Where to Watch Online

description: There's a growing demand for smartwatches and fitness trackers in India, and we've seen quite a few devices make their way to the Gadgets 360 reviews team. From fitness bands counting steps and calories to slim rings offering minimalist designs, many of these devices rely on AI to offer smarter features. Beyond owning a tracker, AI-driven coaching and analytics now define the experience. Here are some of the best wearables we reviewed this year.
title: Best Smartwatches and Fitness Trackers of 2025: Apple Watch Series 11, Google Pixel Watch 4, Huawei Band 10 and More

description: Jay Kelly is a romantic-comedy directed and written by Noah Baumbach, along with co-writer Emily Mortimer. The movie revolves around the life of a famous actor, portrayed by George Clooney, who goes to Europe for a road trip with his manager Ron, played by Adam Sandler. Jay Kelly was a major hit during its theatrical release, and it has begun streaming on OTT in India and worldwide.
title: George Clooney-Starrer Jay Kelly Now Streaming on Netflix: All You Need to Know

description: 2025 signalled a meaningful shift for artificial intelligence, where it shifted from a trending buzzword, to a practical tool. In India, that shift felt even more pronounced, highlighted by Google India’s Year in Search report, where ‘Gemini’ emerged as the second most trending query of the year. Here’s a look at the most notable AI features Google brought to India in 2025.
title: Google's Year in Search 2025 Reveals Gemini 3, Nano Banana Pro and Other AI Search Features Launched in India 2025

description: Netflix is set to buy Warner Bros. Discovery in a landmark deal, combining the top streaming service with one of Hollywood’s oldest studios. Warner Bros. shareholders will get $27.75 per share in cash and Netflix stock. The deal is valued at $72 billion, with an enterprise value of $82.7 billion. Before closing, Warner Bros. will spin off CNN, TBS, and TNT. This marks Netflix’s biggest acquisition to date.
title: Netflix to Buy Warner Bros. in $72 Billion Cash, Stock Deal

description: Poco C85 5G, which is set to arrive in India in the second week of December, will sport a 6.9-inch HD+ display with a 120Hz refresh and up to 810 nits of peak brightness in High Brightness Mode (HBM), the company confirmed on Friday. Moreover, it will also ship with a 200 percent Super Volume Mode. The upcoming Poco C series smartphone will go on sale in the country via Flipkart in Mystic Blue, Spring Green, and Power Black colourways.
title: Poco C85 5G Display Specifications Confirmed Days Ahead of Launch in India: See Expected Specifications

description: Polar Loop fitness tracker has been launched in India, offering a screen-free design with 24/7 tracking and no subscription fees. The band features a lightweight textile strap, Bluetooth LE support and up to eight days of battery life. It tracks activity, sleep and heart rate using Precision Prime sensors and syncs data to the Polar Flow app. The device includes a 64MHz processor, up to four weeks of onboard storage, WR30 water resistance and is available in three colour options.
title: Polar Loop Screen-Free Fitness Tracker Launched in India With Up to Eight Days of Battery Life: Price, Specifications

description: Xiaomi 15S Pro was launched earlier this year with Xiaomi's in-house 3nm 10-core XRING 01 chipset. The phone came as the first phone to ship with this chipset. Now, Xiaomi 17S Pro is said to be in the works as a successor. The upcoming smartphone may use a second-gen XRing chipset. It is likely to come as an addition to the Xiaomi 17 series.
title: Xiaomi 17S Pro Said to Be in Development, Could Launch After Xiaomi 17 Ultra Debuts

description: The smartphone landscape has not changed by much since last year. We have had some new products seep in, but most brands have stuck with their existing formulas and created successors with some upgrades. Foldables have gotten slimmer, clamshells now last longer, and regular smartphones have received a few upgrades that improve their overall performance. Our best smartphones of 2025 list explores the same.
title: Best Smartphones of 2025: From Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7, Vivo X300 Pro, iPhone 17 Pro and more

description: Motorola Edge 70 will be launched in India soon, a microsite for the phone on Flipkart reveals. This comes nearly a month after the smartphone's global debut. It is teased to be available in the country in three colourways and a triple rear cameras. The handset is confirmed to be 5.99mm thick. The global version sports a 6.67-inch display with up to a 120Hz refresh rate. The phone is powered by a Snapdragon 7 series chipset and backed by a 4,800mAh battery.
title: Motorola Edge 70 India Launch Teased; Flipkart Availability Confirmed: Expected Specifications, Features

description: The CFTC has approved spot crypto trading on federally supervised exchanges, marking a major shift in how digital assets are regulated in the US. The decision introduces stronger oversight, clearer protections, and higher operational standards for exchanges. Industry leaders say the move will reshape institutional participation and bring the spot crypto market closer to traditional financial systems.
title: CFTC Clears Path for Spot Crypto Trading on Regulated Platforms for the First Time

description: Realme 16 Pro+ 5G is expected to be on the way to market. Most recently, colour options and RAM and storage specifications of the phone have leaked online. It is tipped to come in four RAM and storage options. Realme could release the phone in Camellia Pink, Master Gold, and Master Grey colour options.
title: Realme 16 Pro+ 5G Colour Options, Memory Configurations Leaked Again; Tipped to Launch With 7,000mAh Battery

description: Google on Thursday announced the Year in Search 2025, revealing several notable trends with regard to searches made by users in India this year. The most trending search in 2025 was the Indian Premier League, owing to the strong affection for the sport in the country. Gemini, surprisingly, was the second most trending search, which indicates increasing adoption of Google’s artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot among users.
title: Google’s Year in Search 2025: Top Trending Topics in India—From Gemini to Squid Games

description: Vivo S50 series will launch in China later this month, including the S50 and S50 Pro Mini. The company has confirmed that the S50 will come in Confession White, Inspiration Purple, Serene Blue and Space Black shades. Key specifications tipped online include a 6.59-inch 1.5K OLED 120Hz display, Snapdragon 8s Gen 3 SoC, up to 16GB RAM, 512GB storage, a 50-megapixel primary camera, a 50-megapixel periscope telephoto lens and a 6,500mAh battery with 90W charging.
title: Vivo S50 Colour Options, Key Features Surface Online; Could Launch in India as Vivo V70

description: Bharti Airtel has quietly discontinued two prepaid recharge packs in India. Priced at Rs. 121 and Rs. 181, the plans offered high-speed data benefits for a period of 30 days. It also included complimentary access to Airtel Xtreme Play Premium, the telecom operator’s subscription service that bundles content from over 25 OTT streaming platforms, including Netflix, JioHotstar, SonyLIV, and more. Airtel consumers will now have to opt for other prepaid recharge packs if they wish to avail of data-only benefits.
title: Airtel Discontinues Two Prepaid Recharge Packs in India With Data Benefits, Free Airtel Xtreme Play Subscription

description: Various websites hosted on Cloudflare have become inaccessible for the second time in three weeks. While the last outage caught the company off guard, this time its website mentions that a "scheduled maintenance is currently in progress". As part of the outage, Canva, BookMyShow, LinkedIn, Notion, Groww, Coinbase, and a number of websites are currently experiencing issues. Interestingly, the downtime tracker, Downdetector, is also not working.
title: Cloudflare Outage Blocks Access to Several Websites Including BookMyShow, SpaceX, Coinbase

description: HMD 101 and HMD 100 have been launched in India. The feature phones will go on sale in the country later today via the HMD India online store, various e-commerce platforms, and other offline retail stores. Both HMD phones will be offered in a single RAM and storage configuration and three colour options. In terms of specifications, the HMD 101 packs a 1,000mAh battery, offering up to seven hours of talk time, while the HMD 100 is equipped with an 800mAh battery, with a claimed talk time of up to six hours. The two are powered by Unisoc 6533G chipsets.
title: HMD 101 Launched in India With 1,000mAh Battery, Auto Call Recording Alongside HMD 100: Price, Features

description: Google’s NotebookLM app now includes a built-in camera on Android and iOS, letting users capture photos of handwritten notes, whiteboards or printed documents and add them as sources. Users can also upload images directly from their gallery. The update expands input options beyond text, PDFs and audio, making it easier to digitise analogue material for AI summarisation and study tools.
title: NotebookLM App Gets an In-Built Camera, Lets Users Upload Images as a Source

description: Samsung has joined hands with fast delivery platform Instamart to enable instant delivery of its Galaxy range of products. This service will be available across key Indian cities. This allows customers to order select Galaxy smartphones, tablets, wearables, and accessories via Instamart and receive them at their doorstep within minutes.  Instamart already offer quick delivery of Asus laptops and Apple, Samsung, OnePlus, and Redmi smartphones in select locations.
title: Samsung Galaxy Phones, Devices Are Now Available via Instamart With 10-Minute Instant Delivery

description: Samsung is reportedly developing a first-party Qi2 wireless charger offering 25W charging for the upcoming Galaxy S26 series, according to a new report. This suggests that all Galaxy S26 series phones may have built-in magnets. The charging dock may have a round, dark grey design with support for Galaxy S, Galaxy Z and Buds devices. The Galaxy S26 Ultra may reach full 25W speeds, while the S26 and S26+ could be limited to around 20W.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Series to Offer Built-In Support for Company's 25W Magnetic Qi2 Charger: Report

description: Bitcoin hovered near $91,900 (roughly Rs. 82.6 lakh) as the crypto market consolidated within a tight range ahead of key US economic cues. Analysts noted repeated rebounds from the high $80,000s and resistance near the $94,000–$95,000 zone, with whale accumulation and ETF inflows supporting the sentiment. Ethereum traded close to $3,154 (roughly Rs. 2.83 lakh) as altcoins weakened slightly.
title: Crypto Traders Await US Fed Signals as Bitcoin Price Drops to $91,900

description: Nothing Phone 3a Lite was launched in India by the UK-based smartphone maker on November 27, following its global debut. Today, the smartphone goes on sale in the country, after the tech firm organised an India-exclusive drop event in New Delhi on November 29. The handset will be available in the country via an e-commerce platform and multiple offline retailers in three colourways and two RAM and storage configurations. It is backed by a 5,000mAh battery and is powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 7300 Pro chipset.
title: Nothing Phone 3a Lite Goes on Sale in India: See Price, Offers, Availability

description: Realme has begun teasing two new Narzo smartphones through comic-style visuals on Amazon India, showing two distinct camera designs that point to a dual launch. The teasers highlight themes of speed and charging, hinting at larger batteries and fast charging. Both models will be Amazon Specials, with more details expected on December 7 as part of a chapter-wise reveal. The phones may belong to the Narzo 90 series. The teasers follow recent launches of the Realme P4x 5G and Realme Watch 5 in India.
title: Realme Narzo Phones Confirmed to Launch in India Soon via Amazon

description: Samsung could unveil a successor to the Galaxy Watch Ultra next year alongside the Galaxy Watch 9. The new model is expected to come with an extra-large battery. Internally, the new model is reportedly being developed under the name Watch 9 Ultra. However, that doesn't mean it will be available in stores under this moniker. The first Galaxy Watch Ultra was internally called Watch 7 Ultra. Therefore, the upcoming model may be called Galaxy Watch Ultra 2.
title: Samsung Galaxy Watch Ultra 2 Launch Timeline Leaked; Could Debut Alongside Samsung Galaxy Watch 9

description: Apple’s FaceTime and Snapchat, the disappearing videos and photos platform, will not allow users to make voice and video calls in Russia, according to a report. The services of the two platforms have reportedly been blocked by the country's Federal Service for Supervision of Communications, Information Technology and Mass Media, Roskomnadzor. In a statement to the Russian government-owned news platform in 2022, the watchdog stated that Snapchat is being used for organising and conducting terrorist activities in the country.
title: Apple’s FaceTime Reportedly Blocked in Russia Alongside Snapchat’s Video Calling Feature

description: Samsung recently teased Exynos 2600, its upcoming processor developed by Samsung Foundry for flagship mobile devices. In recent weeks, the rumour mill has suggested that the South Korean tech giant’s upcoming flagship Galaxy S26 series could be powered by this chipset. However, a recent report claims that while the Galaxy S26 models will indeed get the Exynos 2600 SoC, it will be limited to models sold in Samsung’s home turf.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Series May Get Exynos 2600 Chipset Exclusively in South Korea: Report

description: ACT Fibernet has launched revamped broadband plans in more than 30 indian cities. The plans start from Rs. 499. The value plan comes with access to essential OTT platforms. It costs Rs. 749 in cities like Ahmedabad, Bangalore, Chennai, Delhi, Jaipur, and Lucknow. It offers Prime Video, JioHotstar, Zee5, SunNXT, and Yupp TV subscriptions alongside access to more than 450 live TV channels. In Hyderabad, it costs Rs. 798.
title: ACT Fibernet Launches Revamped Broadband Plans Starting at Rs. 499

description: Anthropic has launched Interviewer, a Claude-powered AI tool that carries out large-scale interviews to study how professionals across jobs use AI. In an initial round of 1,250 interviews, most participants said AI saves time and supports work, while some raised concerns about job roles, control and data security. The system mixes automated interviews with human-reviewed analysis.
title: Anthropic Releases New Claude Tool That Interviews Users About Their AI Usage

description: Motorola has introduced a special edition of the Edge 70 in Cloud Dancer, Pantone’s Colour of the Year 2026. The variant features Pantone 11-4201, a soft white shade, and adds Swarovski crystals on the back panel as part of Motorola’s Brilliant Collection. It will be released in select global markets, with pricing and availability yet to be confirmed. The standard Edge 70 launched in November 2025 in three Pantone colours and is priced at GBP 700 in the UK and EUR 799 in Europe.
title: Motorola Edge 70 Special Edition Launched in Pantone’s 2026 Colour of the Year with Swarovski Accents

description: Apple on Thursday released the list of its 2025 App Store Award winners, recognising 17 apps and games of the year across the iPhone, iPad, Mac, Apple Watch, and Apple TV categories, for their design, innovation, user experience and cultural impact. AI planner and to-do app Tiimo emerged as the best app on iPhone in 2025, while The Pokemon Company’s Pokemon TCG Pocket has been awarded the iPhone Game of the Year title. Other winners included HBO Max, Strava, Cyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition, StoryGraph, and more.
title: Apple Announces App Store Awards 2025 Winners; Top Apps Include Tiimo, Cyberpunk 2077: Ultimate Edition, and More

description: The OnePlus 15R is scheduled to be launched in India soon. It is expected to arrive as a rebranded version of the OnePlus Ace 6T, which recently debuted in China. With less than two weeks to go for its launch, the OnePlus 15R has now been sighted on a benchmarking website. The listing reveals some of its key specifications. The upcoming OnePlus handset is expected to arrive with an octa-core processor and 12GB of RAM.
title: OnePlus 15R With Snapdragon 8 Gen 5 Chipset, 12GB RAM Surfaces on Geekbench Ahead of India Launch

description: A power-packed line-up is landing on your favourite OTT platforms this week --- from horror-thriller to crime drama and comedy of errors. From festive comfort watches and intense whodunits to big-ticket featuresstarring A-listers, the content drop from December 1 through December 7, 2025, has something in store for every mood. So, if you are wondering to watch this weekend, then you have come to the right place. Top releases include Stephen, Thamma, The Girlfriend, Dies Irae, and more.
title: OTT Releases of the Week  (Dec 1 – Dec 7): Thamma, The Great Pre-Wedding Show, Stephen, The Girlfriend, Dies Irae, The Abandons, and More
